applicant-name.name: 无锡和川科技有限公司

invention-title: Push plate type continuous degumming and sintering integrated furnace adopting negative pressure process
一种采用负压工艺的推板式连续脱胶烧结一体炉

abstract.p: The invention discloses a push plate type continuous degumming and sintering integrated furnace adopting a negative pressure process, and relates to the technical field of degumming and sintering integrated furnaces. A sintering feeding airtight mechanism, a degumming furnace section, a sintering furnace section, a water cooling section and a sintering discharging airtight mechanism which allow a bearing box to pass through are sequentially arranged at the rear end of a sintering feeding transverse pushing section in an airtight mode. The sintering feeding airtight mechanism is used for carrying out airtight feeding on the material degreased by the degreasing continuous furnace in the bearing box; the degumming furnace section is used for performing high-temperature degumming on the conveyed materials in the bearing box, and collecting wax oil formed by water cooling after degumming of the materials in the bearing box through a wax collecting device arranged at the side part of the degumming furnace section; the sintering furnace section is used for conducting high-temperature sintering on the conveyed materials in the bearing box. Negative pressure pumping is carried out through the vacuum pump set, argon is filled inside, hydrogen is not introduced like the prior art any more, and the continuous furnace has the advantages of being small in energy consumption loss and large in product yield on the basis of the same amount; and the efficiency is greatly improved, and the productivity is increased.

本发明公开了一种采用负压工艺的推板式连续脱胶烧结一体炉，涉及脱胶烧结一体炉技术领域。本发明烧结进料横推段后端依次气密性设置有供承载盒通行的烧结进料气密机构、脱胶炉段、烧结炉段、水冷段、烧结出料气密机构；烧结进料气密机构用于将承载盒内经脱脂连续炉脱脂的物料进行气密性进料；脱胶炉段用于对传输的承载盒内物料进行高温脱胶，并通过设置于脱胶炉段侧部的集蜡装置将承载盒内物料经脱胶后水冷形成的蜡油进行收集；烧结炉段用于对传输的承载盒内物料进行高温烧结；本发明内部通过真空泵组进行抽负压，内部充入氩气，不再像现有技术一样通入氢气，同量基础上又具有连续炉能耗损失小，产品产量大的优点；大大提高了效率，增加了产能。
